items.name: This Portfolio
items.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, experience, and skills in an interactive and responsive format.

items.name: NavigateCity.com
items.description: A modern web app that helps travelers explore cities worldwide with detailed information on museums, restaurants, parks, landmarks, and local cuisine.

items.name: PASS Database System
items.description: A modernized full-stack platform that streamlines test ordering, score logging, and student data managementâ€”replacing an outdated legacy system with a more efficient and secure workflow.

items.name: Network Connected Chess Game
items.description: An evolving chess game project that grew from a local console version into a socket-based multiplayer system, and finally into a scalable web-based app with modern UI and WebSocket support. (In Development)

items.name: JunggleWordMania
items.description: An educational multiplayer game that helps students build vocabulary by unscrambling words, featuring classroom game creation, leaderboards, and custom teacher word lists.

items.name: Article Classification Program
items.description: A program that classifies articles into News, Sports, or Culinary categories by analyzing word frequencies and scoring against trained datasets.
